mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(member_id, name, password, gender, birthdate, phone_number, city, region, kakaoacc_yn, comment_count, join_count, host_count) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{name}, #{password}', #{gender}, #{birthdate}, #{phone_number}, #{city}, #{region}, #{kakaoacc_yn}, #{comment_count}, #{join_count}, #{host_count});
